summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Bendita Marm delivery site. Main bug fix verified - site no longer freezes browser. Splash screen, navigation, modal, and WhatsApp button all working correctly.

ui_bugs.issue: Button text color is blue (rgb(0, 90, 141)) instead of white as intended
ui_bugs.details: CSS class 'text-white' is applied but being overridden by other styles

integration_issues.issue: Direct navigation to /checkout redirects to /products page
integration_issues.details: May be intentional redirect or missing checkout page implementation

passed_tests: Site loads without browser freezing (main bug fix verified)
Splash screen appears and disappears correctly in ~2.5 seconds
Splash screen useRef/useCallback fix prevents infinite re-renders
Card치pio button is visible and clickable
Product cards and promotional sections load properly
Promotional modal appears after 3 seconds and can be closed
WhatsApp button is visible and properly positioned (bottom-right)
Overall site performance and responsiveness is good
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix Card치pio button text color - ensure 'text-white' class takes precedence over other color styles. Investigate checkout page routing if checkout functionality is intended.
